text: Puffin Rock is a Irish animated children's television series. It follows the adventures of two young puffins named Oona and Baba as they explore their world, the series originally aired on RTÃ‰jr in Ireland, Milkshake! and Nick Jr. in The United Kingdom, Sprout in The United States TVO and Knowledge Network in Canada and is currently airing on Netflix worldwide as a original series and Boomerang and Disney XD in The United States. Category:Children's television series
title: Puffin Rock
